"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>

      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>36985ab8-22ae-4d0f-b0cc-1bd3cfc93d5d#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Mozart: Varázsfuvola</string>
            <string language="en">Mozart: Magic flute</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mozart: Magische Flöte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mozart : Cannelure magique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mozart: Flauta mágica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mozart: Scanalatura magica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μότσαρτ: Μαγικό φλάουτο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mozart: Flauta mágica</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A gonosz hatalmakat elnyelte az ijesztő sötétség</string>
            <string language="en">The frightening darknes swallowed up the evil powers</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">wolfgang amadeus mozart varázsfuvola ,  </string>
            <string language="en">Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, magic flute</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die erschreckenden darknes schluckten oben die 
schlechten Energien</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les darknes effrayants se sont engloutis les 
puissances mauvaises</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os darknes frightening engoliram acima as 
potências evil</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I darknes spaventosi swallowed in su le potenzi 
diaboliche</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο εκφοβισμός darknes κατάπιε επάνω τις κακές 
δυνάμεις</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los darknes espantosos tragaron para arriba las 
potencias malvadas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, magische Flöte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, cannelure magique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, flauta mágica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, scanalatura magica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βολφγκαγκ Amadeus Mozart, μαγικό φλάουτο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, flauta mágica</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
